response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by its creators, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a purchase price of $14,000 for you to experience its full potential. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset that could significantly enhance your needs or interests. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
